tuv.seg: Equipment grants for students with disabilities
Deontais trealaimh do scoláirí le riachtanaisí speisealta
This document describes a scheme that provides a grant to schools to allow them to buy equipment for students with disabilities at post-primary level
Tá cur síos anseo ar scéim a chuireann deontas ar fáil do scoileanna chun cur ar an gcumas treallamh a cheannacht do scolairí faoi mhíchumas
Financial help with going to school
Tacaíocht airgeadais le dul ar scoil
There are several schemes to help with the costs of going to school
Tá roinnt scéimeanna i bhfeidhm chun cabhrú leis na costais a bhaineann le freastal ar scoil
The Department of Education and Skills operates a Visiting Teacher Service for deaf children and children with visual impairments
Oibríonn an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna seirbhís mhúinteora ar cuairt le haghaidh páistí bodhra nó lagéisteachta agus páistí le lagú amhairc
Resources for non-English-speaking pupils
Acmhainní do dhaltaí nach cainteoirí Béarla iad
This document describes the educational supports for non-English-speaking students in primary and post-primary schools
Tugann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar an tacaíocht oideachais le haghaidh daltaí nach cainteoirí Béarla iad i mbunscoileanna agus in iar-bhunscoileanna
Psychological services for schools
Seirbhís síceolaíochta i scoileanna
The National Educational Psychological Service provides psychological services in primary and post-primary schools
Cuireann an tSeirbhís Náisiúnta Síceolaíochta Oideachais seirbhísí síceolaíochta ar fáil i mbunscoileanna agus in iar-bhunscoileanna
Educational arrangements for Travellers
Socraithe oideachais don Lucht Siúil
This document privide information on the arrangements in place for the education of Traveller children
Cur síos ar na socraithe oideachais atá ar fáil do pháistí an lucht siúil
There are a number of education schemes for young people and others who have left school without a recognised qualification
Tá roinnt scéimeanna oideachais ann do dhaoine óga agus do dhaoine eile a d'fhág an scoil gan aon cháilíocht aitheanta
Schools and information technology
Scoileanna agus teicneolaíocht faisnéise
This document outlines the development and support of information and communications technology in schools
Tugtar breac-chuntas sa cháipéis seo ar fhorbairt agus ar thacaíocht le teicneolaíocht faisnéise agus cumarsáide i scoileanna
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
